scripts.docker:build: dotenv -e ./apps/client/.env -- docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml build
scripts.docker:dev: yarn docker:stop || dotenv -e ./apps/client/.env -- docker compose up --build -d && yarn dev
scripts.docker:prod: yarn docker:stop || dotenv -e ./apps/client/.env -- docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --build
scripts.docker:stop: dotenv -e ./apps/client/.env -- docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml down
scripts.release: turbo run lint build && changeset publish && git push --follow-tags
